title: In 2016 - A Journey begins
discription: Pride Placement started as a Job Consultancy is Founded by Mr Rajeev Poddar & Ms Ruchi Tiwari.

title: From 2017 - Improvement
discription: Ruchi, has complementary skills and expertise to run a Job Consultancy and Rajeev has expertise in growing a business.

title: From 2018 - Registration
discription: Pride Placement became a legal identity as a GST Proprietorship Company.

title: From 2019 - Expansion
discription: It's become clear Leeds won't suffice and a Great Team Established to manage the ever-growing number of so many clients.

title: From 2020 - Market Leader
discription: We're a market leader in Faridabad, Haryana India as per Google in the Top Placement Consultants or Best Job Placement Consultancy in Faridabad.

title: From 2021 - Empowering - Startup - Pride Consultancy
discription: A remarkable achievement of onboarding new clients amidst the covid times to small and medium business to our Recruitment and Technology Company.

title: From 2022 - Top in Recruitment & Web Development in Faridabad, Haryana
discription: We've got top ranking on Google for Job Consultancy and Website Development Company in Faridabad.
